item.title: Karie add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Karie add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Karie add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
item.description: "No 'Glory shall be your reward' for me. Oh, no, for me, it is, 'Stop whining' and 'Go to bed'." -- Megan Whalen Turner

item.title: Karie add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
item.description: "Are you badly hurt?" "Hideously," said the king, without sounding injured at all. "I am disemboweled. My insides may in an instant become my outsides as I stand here before you." -- Megan Whalen Turner

item.title: Karie add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
item.description: "Sometimes, if you want to change a man's mind, you have to change the mind of the man next to him first." -- Megan Whalen Turner

item.title: Karie add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
item.description: "The king lifted a hand to her cheek and kissed her. It was not a kiss between strangers, not even a kiss between a bride and groom. It was a kiss between a man and his wife, and when it was over, the king closed his eyes and rested his forehead in the hollow of the queen's shoulder, like a man seeking respite, like a man reaching home at the end of the day." -- Megan Whalen Turner

item.title: Karie add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
item.description: "This is the stupidest plan I have ever in my career participated in," Xenophon said. "I love stupid plans," said Eugenides." -- Megan Whalen Turner

item.title: Karie add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
item.description: "If I am the pawn of the gods, it is because they know me so well, not because they make my mind up for me." -- Megan Whalen Turner

item.title: Karie add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
Karie add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
Karie add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
item.description:
"Your Majesty, please get down. My friend Aris is really a very good man, and if you fall off that wall he's going to hang for it, and so will his squad, most of whom are also nice men, and though I can't say I really care if your attendants hang, there are probably many people that do care, and would you please, please get down?"
The king looked at him, eyes narrowed. "I don't think I've ever heard you say that many words in a row. You sounded almost articulate." -- Megan Whalen Turner

item.title: Karie add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
item.description: "I think a good book is a good book forever. I don't think they get less good because times change." -- Megan Whalen Turner

item.title: Karie add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
item.description: "I CAN DO ANYTHING I WANT!" -- Megan Whalen Turner

item.title: Karie add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
item.description: "Sounis had been thinking of Ambiades. "He would have been a better man under different circumstances." Gen looked at him. "True enough," he said. "But does a good man let his circumstances determine his character?" -- Megan Whalen Turner

item.title: Karie add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
item.description: "Safety is an illusion, Costis. A Thief might fall at any time, and eventually the day must come when the god will let him. Whether I am on a rafter three stories up or on a staircase three steps up, I am in my god's hands. He will keep me safe, or he will not, here or on the stairs." -- Megan Whalen Turner

item.title: Karie add a quote by Megan Whalen Turner
item.description: "I didn't think about being king,” he said, his voice hoarse. Eddis stared. “Your capacity to land yourself in a mess because you didn't think first, Eugenides, will never cease to amaze me. What do you mean you didn't think about being king? Is Attolia going to marry you and move into my library?" -- Megan Whalen Turner

item.title: Karie add a quote by Sherwood Smith
item.description: "You, there, girl! Halt!" Who in the <i>universe</i> ever halts when the enemy tells them to?" -- Sherwood Smith
